channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Comex Gold Settles Higher, Silver Falls
item.description: Gold settled 0.9% higher, up for a fourth consecutive session, and silver fell 0.1%, down for two consecutive sessions.

item.title: Nvidia Is on Top But Does It Have Anywhere to Go But Down?
item.description: The AI titan will maintain its strong lead, but complicated product rollouts, sky-high expectations and the China threat add complications to growth p...

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Nvidia's earnings cleared our lofty bar. Hereâ€™s our new price target on the AI chip king
item.description: Don't be fooled by the sellers: Nvidia's future is as healthy as ever.

item.title: Lowe's beats on earnings and hikes guidance, but still expects sales to fall this year
item.description: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.

item.title: Palo Alto Networks beat and raise fails to wow Wall Street. But that plays into our hand
item.description: Don't sweat the drop in Palo Alto Networks stock.

item.title: Snowflake shares rocket 34% and head for best day ever after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Dow Rises, Alphabet Selloff Weighs on Nasdaq
item.description: The Dow jumped, powered by gains at Salesforce, IBM and Goldman Sachs. The Nasdaq pulled back amid losses at Alphabet.

item.title: Bitcoin Hits Fresh Record High, Could Soon Reach $100K
item.description: Bitcoin hit a fresh record high and Hargreaves Lansdown said it could soon reach $100,000 on hopes of a crypto-friendly federal stance under Donald Tr...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Inventory Draw Gets Season Started
item.description: Natural gas futures were at their highest level in a year as the EIA reported a small decline in inventories for last week, getting the withdrawal sea...
